thread.title: 3.27% Rally In Sensex This Week; Earnings Key To Further Upside
thread.title_full: 3.27% Rally In Sensex This Week; Earnings Key To Further Upside

title: 3.27% Rally In Sensex This Week; Earnings Key To Further Upside
text:
Published: Saturday, October 10, 2015, 8:46 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
Benchmark indices rallied this week as global cues remained solid after Minutes of the US Fed meeting suggested that hike in interest rates in the US may be pushed further back into the next year. 
Markets in Asia, Europe and US all saw sharp rallies. The Chinese Shanghai Composite, which opened almost after a weak of holidays also supported the global markets. The Nifty saw its highest closing since Aug at 8189 points. This was also the best weekly rally that stocks have seen since June 2015.
Going forward the rally would depend much on the results season that pans out. Major corporate like Infosys, TCS, Hindustan Unilever and Reliance will declare their results next week. Most of these companies are heavyweight stocks from their sector and any disappointment could drag the stock prices and hence the indices lower. 
While Infosys will declare results on Oct 12, TCS would be on Oct 13, HUL on Oct 14 and Reliance Industries on Oct 16. The top gainers this week were most of the stock from the beaten down sector of metals. Nifty Stocks that saw sharp gains this week were: 
Vedanta - 24%
